Literature.Title: Ultrashort antibacterial and antifungal lipopeptides
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2006;103:15997–16002
Literature.Author: Makovitzki A, Avrahami D, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6% Hemolysis=20 µM,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=>100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 26430(MIC=>100µM),Aspergillus flavus ATCC 9643(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>100µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC MYA-422(MIC=100µM)
